mapper.insert: insert into IsuPageElement (`key`, code, label, `type`, `input`, fullLine, required, fieldId, `tabId`, pageId, orgId, ordr, deleted, disabled, createTime) values (#{key}, #{code}, #{label}, #{type}, #{input}, #{fullLine}, #{required}, #{fieldId}, #{tabId}, #{pageId}, #{orgId}, #{ordr}, FALSE, FALSE, NOW())
mapper.select:
SELECT o.* FROM IsuPageElement o
WHERE o.tabId = #{id} AND o.deleted != true AND o.disabled != true
ORDER BY o.ordr ASC
